name: DeFi
description: DeFi, or Decentralized Finance, is a sector within the blockchain space that seeks to recreate traditional financial systems—like lending, borrowing, and trading—using decentralized technologies.

sub_categories.name: DEX
sub_categories.description: A DEX, or Decentralized Exchange, is a type of blockchain platform that allows users to trade cryptocurrencies directly with one another without relying on a central authority or intermediary.
